articles.author: Martin Plimmer
articles.title: In Roald Dahl’s Car
articles.description: A young hitchhiker’s encounter with the famous author’s macabre imagination.
articles.content:
He chuckled. Sounds grim, he said.
Its not really, I said. Well, the undertakers are grim, but people are actually very happy to be approached for an obituary. And theyre good stories too. Obituaries celebrate whole lives. It would be hard not to find a coup… [+1832 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Chief: City Employee Targeted Co-Worker in Deadly Shooting - The New York Times
articles.description: A deadly shooting at a city building in Winston-Salem, North Carolina was an act of “workplace violence" by one city employee who targeted a co-worker he'd disliked for a long time, police said Friday.
articles.content: The police chief said that officers arrived around 6:41 a.m., four minutes after they began receiving multiple 911 calls from city employees about the shooting. Officers heard gunshots as they arrived and moved toward the threat, she said. They encountered Ha… [+1246 chars]

articles.title: U.K. Parliament Advances Brexit Bill, All but Assuring January Exit
articles.description: For more than two years, votes on leaving the European Union were anguished affairs that roiled the parties. This time, there was little opposition.
articles.content:
The former prime minister, Theresa May, lost her post over Brexit. Mr. Corbyn, who is shouldering much of the blame for Labours worst performance in a general election since 1935, will soon join her on the backbenches.

articles.title: The Old Man and the Greek: N.B.A. Tale Only Needs a Great Ending
articles.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo vs. LeBron James, young vs. old, was billed as a pass-the-baton moment. But don’t read too much into one game.
articles.content: Wes Matthews, the 33-year-old forward and guard, was charged with guarding James this night. He succeeded, as much as anyone could, in bewitching the leagues reigning grand old man. One minute he bumped with James, the next he backed off and switched. Its a t… [+1761 chars]
